short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your API keys and license tokens locally in your browser and sync with Google Drive.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Arzo Keys is the ultimate solution for managing and syncing your license keys effortlessly. Designed for convenience and reliability, it helps you create, edit, delete, and organize your keys in a sleek, user-friendly interface.

Key Features

Free Plan:

Create, Edit, Delete, and Manage Keys: Organize your keys with ease.
Favorites: Mark important keys for quick access.
Search & Filter: Find keys instantly by name or type.
Import/Export Keys: Transfer your keys effortlessly between devices.
Light & Dark Modes: Switch between themes to match your preference.

Premium Features:

Cloud Sync Across Devices: Keep your data synchronized across multiple devices.
Real-Time Updates: Instantly sync newly created, edited, or deleted keys.
Favorites Sync: Your favorite keys stay consistent everywhere.
Up to 5 Device Activations: Use the extension on multiple devices seamlessly.
Lifetime Updates & Support: Enjoy continuous improvements and dedicated help.

With Arzo Keys, you’ll never lose track of your license keys again. Whether you’re a casual user or a power user managing multiple keys, this extension offers everything you need to stay organized and productive.

Try Arzo Keys today and simplify your license key management!
